speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mr Graefe zu Baringdorf, on behalf of the Committee on Agriculture and Rural Development, on risk and crisis management in the agricultural sector [ 2005/2053(INI) ] ( A6-0014/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Mr Graefe zu Baringdorf, on behalf of the Committee on Agriculture and Rural Development, on risk and crisis management in the agricultural sector [ 2005/2053(INI) ] ( A6-0014/2006 ).
agenda_item: Risk and crisis management in agriculture (debate)
